tests.name: Basic Agentforce chat interface validation Test
tests.description: Standard test scenario for Agentforce chat interface validation

recommendations: Include performance tests to monitor page load times and resource usage

recommendations.message: Agentforce presence not detected. Ensure Agentforce is properly implemented and visible.
Chat interface functionality is limited. Improve input handling and send button functionality.
Security measures need enhancement. Implement proper security headers and HTTPS.
